State prods Amazon to
start collecting sales tax

The Patrick administration is arguing that Amazon.com Inc. is no longer exempt under federal law from charging Massachusetts sales tax. (Boston Globe)
  • Survey Support Mass. sales tax for Amazon.com?

Israel says bomb blast hits bus in Tel Aviv

A bomb ripped through an Israeli bus near the nation's military headquarters in Tel Aviv today, wounding at least 10 people, Israeli officials said. (AP, 7:18 a.m.)

Celebrate Movember; Grow a mustache

The worldwide event calls on people to grow mustaches to raise awareness and money for men's health issues. Join in the fun and send us your picture.

The first high school football team

The story of the nation's first high school football team is steeped in local history. At left, members of the Oneida Football Club attended the dedication of a Boston Common marker in 1925. 87 years later, the team's descendants posed in the same spot. (Boston Globe)
  • Pictures Oneida Football Club | Thanksgiving preview
  • Thanksgiving football history | Watch Games to watch

Business leaders locally and nationally are mulling how they would tackle the slew of tax increases and expense cuts set to take effect in the new year. (Boston Globe)

see call for jail time

It’s peak pie season for bakeries, including the Whole Foods Bread and Circus Bakehouse, where a pastry team churns out 80,000 pies for Thanksgiving.

Time to save Thanksgiving, again

Many big box retailers are rendering Black Friday obsolete this year by opening their doors Thanksgiving night as early as 8 p.m.

Medical researchers’ funds at risk

Mass. hospitals and research universities face a double-barreled threat from cuts in federal funding if a plan to curb the national debt is not reached by the end of the year.

Airport seizures create new market

The New Hampshire State Surplus Store sells the stuff that gets confiscated by security at New England's busiest airports, including Logan.

38-story tower planned at Garden

AvalonBay Communities Inc.’s apartment tower next to TD Garden would include a two-story retail arcade connecting to the arena and North Station.
